subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Dellin Betances, once a part of a trio of Yankees starting pitching prospects dubbed the “Killer B’s,” is attempting to reinvent himself as a reliever and break into the Major League club.
snippet: Dellin Betances, once a part of a trio of Yankees starting pitching prospects dubbed the “Killer B’s,” is attempting to reinvent himself as a reliever and break into the Major League club.
